InputActionPlugin
MonoBehaviour
public abstract
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​InputActionPlugin

A base class for Plugins which are used by the InputActionManager to manipulate the InputAction data received from the Service.

Variables
InputActionOutput
public event InputActionManager.InputActionEvent InputActionOutput

An event for transmitting InputActions as they pass through this plugin.  This can be used to access the data as it is used by a specific plugin, as to intercept the full cycle of plugins that the InputActionManager references.

Functions
RunPlugin
public InputAction? RunPlugin(
InputAction _inputAction
)

Called from InputActionManager and provided a InputAction as a parameter.  This function is a wrapper that guarantees that the results of ModifyInputAction are both returned to the InputActionManager and transmitted via TransmitInputAction.

ModifyInputAction
protected abstract InputAction? ModifyInputAction(
InputAction _inputAction
)

Called from RunPlugin and provided a InputAction as a parameter.  This function is used to manipulate the incoming InputAction data. Returns a InputAction which is then distributed via the InputActionManager.

TransmitInputAction
internal void TransmitInputAction(
InputAction _inputAction
)

To be used to Invoke the InputActionOutput event from any child class of this base.
